column5: Hey everyone, I know I don't post on here much, but I wanted to extend a Happy Birthday to my dad (Pikeslayer) on here. We have met quite a few of you, and made alot of friends from this forum and i'm sure alot of you would like to extend a happy birthday to him aswell. I whole heartly appreciate everything he has done for me over the years and I'm sure alot of you have appreciated going out fishing with him aswell. I hope you have a great day dad, too bad i couldn't be home enjoying it with you, but i'll try my best to catch a nice walleye for you, so we can have a nice fish fry in a couple weeks. hope its a great day  well talk soon, cheers  sean aka pikeslayer jr.
Did he get a new sub-troll and cannon ball for his b-day?  Happy Birthday Simon.
Yer a good Man PSjr !!!! And your dad is a class act for sure. Happy Birthday Simon All the best on this day.  Paul
Have a good b-day Simon.  I hope you are out fishing...
Happy Birthday Simon and thanks for the heads up, Sean.
happy birthday simon... hope its full of joy and happiness... and maybe a fish?
Happy B-Day Simon  Enjoy the Keg
Happy Birthday Simon,  See you and Sean next month
Best wishes Symon, may cables never snap and all your hits be solid.
No matter how you say it,Simon/Symon,it,s all good. Hope yer day went well.
Happy Bday Simon All the best to you  And what Albert said as well
Hey All, Thx for the birthday wishes!  Seanshine, you are the ultimate Son. Love you buddy  I love birthdays;   DB, thx for dinner!
